info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 10 at 12:26AM EDT until June 10 at 5:49PM EDT by NWS Binghamton NY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New York...
Cohocton River Near Campbell affecting Steuben County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cohocton River near Campbell.
* WHEN...Until late this afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Minor flooding starts. Flood waters exit the river channel at Main Street near the Campbell-Savona schools and begin to inundate fields and low spots along the Savona-Campbell Road.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise just above flood stage. It will then fall below flood stage later this morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1230 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON
